extendedInfo.description: *REQUIRES ROOT**REQUIRES A CUSTOM ROM THAT IS EQUIPPED WITH THE THEME CHOOSER APPLICATION LIKE BAKED, AOKP, CM10,  ETC**IF YOU RECEIVE THE ERROR THAT THE THEME WAS COMPILED INCORRECTLY JUST APPLY THE "STOCK" THEME AND YOU MUST REBOOT. THEN INSTALL CITRUS BLEND AND REBOOT*If you still get the compiled incorrectly error, change your DPI to 240 or 360 either within your ROM's settings or a market app. After you set it to a higher DPI, REBOOT, apply theme, reset DPI, REBOOT, Profit*TESTED ON HDPI AND X-HDPI DEVICES*Themed So Far:*Apex Launcher*Nova Launcher*Calculator - Inverted*Calendar -  Inverted*DeskClock*Gmail - Partially Inverted*Mms -Partially Inverted*Contacts*Phone*ROM Control (AOKP)*Settings*SystemUI*Framework-res*Twitter - Inverted*Dropbox - Inverted*Tapatalk - Dark Theme*Play Store - Inverted*Play Music*Pandora - Widget*Animated Notification IconsINSTALLATION GUIDE:1. Download the theme2. Go to the settings menu where you apply the theme(s)3. Choose CITRUS BLEND4. Hit "Apply anyway" (if you get the compiling error follow my steps at the very top of this page)5. REBOOT6. Get Blended

reviews.title: Nice but.....
reviews.comment: Very nice in colors but with this theme as well as your others.  Lock screen slider isn\'t centered but nice.
reviews.author: Rob Cadmus

reviews.title: B-BOY\342\204\242 ROCKS
reviews.comment: Anything by B-BOY\342\204\242 is good... take it to the Bank.
reviews.author: Jason Hawks
